title: CupCake Wars - Part 4
desc: We are happy to announce that the 4th installment of CupCake Wars in now scheduled for Sunday March 6th 2016. ?A Young Mother's D.R.E.A.M. is continuing our effort to raise money for scholarships. ?This year the goal is $5000 to help 5 young mothers with their education goals. Please come out and support our dreamchasers! CupCake Wars is a competition where 20 contestants will bake 2 different flavors of cupcakes each and compete for the Grand Prize of $500 and a special prize for the People's Choice Winner. ?The attendees get unlimited cupcakes and the opportunity to vote for their favorites. ?Every year we have a great turn out and our sweet tooths are more than satisifed. ?Join us!! Location is TBD until we confirm the number of contestants we need to accomodate
